name: Super Freddy
description:
2022 Freddit GameJam Submission (2nd Rank Overall)

Approved by 

@Th3Badd3st 

 "S-Teir fan-game by Default"

RELEASED!!!!!

Go Play!!!

Story

After the Fazbear Gang has been kidnapped, Freddy Fazbear sets out on a quest to save his friends!

Controls

A and D (Movement)

Space/W (Jump)

P (Pause)

E (Fire)

Shift (Sprint)

Escape (Quite to Menu, During Pause)

Features

  • Fun Platforming gameplay
  • Multiple Unique Powerups
  • Multiple Enemies
  • 6 Levels
  • A bonus hard "Plus Mode"
  • 4 Achievable stars
  • Fun Secrets
  • 2 Different Endings
  • Toggleable Retro Filter

Special Thanks

@realscawthon 
(Creator of FNAF and Related characters)

@berowdee 
(Very supportive friend who has helped me out alot on my gamedev journy, go support and follow him)

@Th3Badd3st 
(Amazing person, great content creator, and seeing them support small games like mine just make me so happy!)

Credits

@PrestonC3po : All sprites and code

Freesound.org: All music and sound effects
